content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) extracting iron ore
- Wooden chest at (15.5,72.5) storing iron ore (currently contains 15 iron ore)

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (-46.5,70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (-46.5,70.5) extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-46.5,72.5) storing copper ore (currently contains 16 copper ore)

### Power Generation System at (-9.5,-0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,-0.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (-5.0,-0.5) converting water to steam (currently has coal fuel)
- Steam engine at (-0.5,-0.5) generating electricity
- Pipe network connecting the components (currently not fully functional)

### Iron Smelting Operation at (16.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (16.0,71.0) extracting iron ore (fueled with coal, output blocked)
- Wooden chest at (16.5,72.5) storing iron ore (contains 2 iron ore)
- Burner inserter at (19.5,70.5) (waiting for source items)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,70.5) (waiting for source items)
- Wooden chest at (22.5,70.5) (empty)
- Stone furnace at (20.0,70.0) (no ingredients to smelt)

### Copper Mining Operation at (-46.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-46.0,71.0) extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-46.5,72.5) storing copper ore

### Smelting Setups
- Stone furnace at (100.0,100.0) with wooden chest at (98.5,100.5) (no ingredients)
- Stone furnace at (300.0,300.0) with wooden chest at (298.5,300.5) (no ingredients)

## ERROR TIPS

### Repeated Burner Inserter Placement Failures
- Multiple failed attempts to place burner inserter at (19.0,70.0) due to existing objects
- Verify target position is clear before placing (steps 88, 90, 92, 95)
- Consider alternative positions or remove existing objects first

### Belt Connection Errors
- Repeated attempts to connect belts directly to wooden chests (steps 89, 91, 94)
- Always use inserters between chests and belts
- Verify inserter placement and orientation before belt connections

### Undefined Module Errors
- Attempt to use undefined 'random' module (step 93)
- Import required modules before use
- Verify all referenced names are defined

### Existing Issues from Previous Report
- Burner mining drill at (16.0,71.0) still has output blocked
- Multiple furnaces remain without ingredients (100.0,100.0, 300.0,300.0)
- Power system still not fully functional
- Continue addressing these persistent issues

### Entity Placement Best Practices
- Always check for existing entities before placement
- Maintain proper spacing between components
- Verify terrain suitability (not water or occupied tiles)
